scripts.start: concurrently "cd empresas && npm start" "cd home && npm start" "cd login && npm start" "cd main && npm start" "cd parceiros && npm start" "cd sobre && npm start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd empresas && npm i" "cd home && npm i" "cd login && npm i" "cd main && npm i" "cd parceiros && npm i" "cd sobre && npm i" "npm i"
